name: Patternly – WordPress Pattern Library for Gutenberg
author: Optemiz

sections.description:
Patternly is an ultimate add-on for Gutenberg with its comprehensive solution for quickly creating professional-looking websites with a library of Gutenberg block patterns and templates .

✅ 500+ Patterns | ✅ 40+ Templates

👉 Support
👉 Tutorials

WordPress Block Template library

Patternly library offers 40+ built-in WordPress Templates. Modern light and dark templates are available to use from the library.

WordPress Block Pattern library

Patternly library offers 500+ built-in WordPress patterns. With Patternly, Enjoy to build beautiful websites with reusable block patterns.

Built with Core Gutenberg blocks

Gutenberg core blocks are the main components of Patternly to build unique and creative patterns. Build and design pages or posts without writing a single line of code.

⭐ HERE’S THE IMPORTANT THING

Finally, A complete WordPress Block Pattern library is here to extend Gutenberg building beautiful websites very easily and smartly with just a few clicks.

Template Categories

Patternly has 15+ Gutenberg page types, including:

  • AC Technician Template
  • Agency Template
  • Book Store Template
  • Car Garage Template
  • Community Template
  • Construction Template
  • Doctor Template
  • Fitness Template
  • Gym Template
  • Landing Pages
  • Online Courses Template
  • Plumber Template
  • Portfolio & CV Template
  • Real Estate Template
  • SaaS Template
  • Salon Template
  • Travel Blog Template
  • Yoga Template

Block Pattern Types

Patternly has 15+ Gutenberg pattern types, including:

  • About patterns
  • Call to action patterns
  • Career patterns
  • Contact patterns
  • Counter patterns
  • Feature patterns
  • Footer patterns
  • Gallery patterns
  • Grid patterns
  • Header patterns
  • Hero patterns
  • Info patterns
  • Portfolio patterns
  • Pricing patterns
  • Service patterns
  • Skill patterns
  • Team patterns
  • Testimonial patterns

💥 Key Features of Patternly

  • One-Click Import and Customization:
    With Patternly, importing templates is a breeze. A single click brings your chosen design into your editor, ready for customization. This feature is designed to save time and streamline the website creation process.

  • Cloud Storage and Team Collaboration:
    Patternly introduces cloud storage functionality, allowing you to save and access your designs from any device. This feature is handy for team collaborations, enabling multiple users from different locations to work on the same project.

  • Optimized for Performance:
    The plugin prioritizes website speed and performance. It ensures that adding new templates and blocks keeps your site’s loading times the same.

  • Responsive and Mobile-Friendly Designs:
    All templates and blocks within Patternly are responsive. It guarantees that your website looks great and functions flawlessly on any device, whether desktop, tablet, or mobile.

  • Save Favourite Patterns:
    Users can easily save favourite patterns in just one click and all the saved patterns can easily be used anytime easily.

  • Regular Updates and Professional Support:
    Patternly is backed by a dedicated team offering regular updates and professional support. This ensures that the plugin remains compatible with the latest WordPress versions.

  • Seamless Integration with Gutenberg:
    Patternly is designed to integrate seamlessly with the Gutenberg editor, enhancing its functionality and offering additional design options and flexibility.

  • Custom CSS and Advanced Styling Options:
    Patternly provides advanced styling options, including custom CSS capabilities for those who wish to dive deeper into customization. This allows for more detailed and unique website designs.

  • Diverse Range of Use Cases:
    Whether you’re building a blog, an e-commerce site, a portfolio, or a business website, Patternly’s extensive WordPress pattern library caters to a wide array of use cases. You can make a versatile choice for various website projects.

👩🏻‍💻 Dedicated Support Forum

Users can access a support forum specifically for Patternly to post queries, seek solutions, and share insights with a community of users and experts.

📕 Online Documentation and Tutorials

Comprehensive documentation and step-by-step tutorials will be available, offering guidance on using Patternly’s features and troubleshooting common issues.

🤘Regular Updates

Regular updates to ensure compatibility with the latest WordPress versions and incorporate new features based on user feedback.

📫 Email Support

An email support service is always there for you for more direct assistance. It allows our users to contact the Patternly team for personalized help.

🙋‍♂️ Live Chat Support

Real-time assistance through live chat with instant problem-solving and guidance.

🎥 Video Guides

Video tutorials and walkthroughs are a part of the support package. It helps the users visually understand how to utilize various plugin features.

👨‍👩‍👧‍👧 Community Engagement

Active participation in WordPress community forums and events. It provides additional rooms for support and networking with other WordPress users and professionals.

🗣️ Feedback and Suggestions Channel

A dedicated channel for users to provide feedback and suggest improvements or new features, ensuring the plugin evolves to meet user needs.

💚 Satisfied with Patternly?
👉 Join our LinkedIn Community
👉 Join our Facebook Page
⭐ Rate us on WordPress [Your Review, Our Inspiration]

Privacy Policy

Patternly – WordPress Pattern Library for Gutenberg uses Appsero SDK to collect some telemetry data upon user’s confirmation. This helps us to troubleshoot problems faster & make product improvements.

Appsero SDK does not gather any data by default. The SDK only starts gathering basic telemetry data when a user allows it via the admin notice. We collect the data to ensure a great user experience for all our users.

Integrating Appsero SDK DOES NOT IMMEDIATELY start gathering data, without confirmation from users in any case.

Learn more about how Appsero collects and uses this data.
sections.installation:
1. Install using the WordPress plugin installer, or extract the zip file and drop the contents into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Edit or create a new page on your site
  4. Press the ‘Patternly’ button at the topbar of the editor header
  5. Browse and import beautiful patterns and full page layouts; click one to add it directly to the page.
sections.faq:
Will Patternly work with any theme?

Yes! With Patternly, You can create a beautiful site in just a few clicks with just about any WordPress theme.

After importing template, Why I see some broken UI on Editor?

Hey! Don’t Worry. You’re almost there. If you see broken UI after importing the template, Please refresh the page to see updated changes.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Added: 50+ free Patterns added
  • Added: 40+ free Page added

1.0.5

  • Added: 15+ free patterns added

1.0.4

  • Added: 30+ free patterns added
  • Improved: Data fetching time optimized and faster responses.

1.0.3

  • Fixed: Patternly library in non fullscreen mode style conflict – issue fixed.
  • Fixed: Multi pattern importing at a time – issue fixed.
  • Fixed: Added to favourite icon not active – issue fixed.

1.0.2

  • Added: Save favourite patterns feature.
  • Improved: Fast loading performace.

1.0.1

  • Enhancement: Minor enhancement.
  • Added: AppSero Tracker added with privacy policy.

1.0.0

  • Initial release

short_description: The best WordPress pattern and template library with built-in Gutenberg block templates for the Gutenberg block editor.
